an6.65:1.1: “Mendicants, without giving up six things you can’t realize the fruit of non-return.
an6.65:1.3: Lack of faith, conscience, and prudence; laziness, unmindfulness, and witlessness.
an6.65:1.4: Without giving up these six things you can’t realize the fruit of non-return.
an6.65:2.1: After giving up six things you can realize the fruit of non-return.
an6.65:2.3: Lack of faith, conscience, and prudence; laziness, unmindfulness, and witlessness.
an6.65:2.4: After giving up these six things you can realize the fruit of non-return.”
